title: Hybrid cable tension-length compensation algorithm for dynamic performance improvement of mobile cable-driven parallel robot
description: This paper presents a hybrid compensation algorithm that combines cable tension and length control to improve the dynamic performance of mobile cable-driven parallel robots (MCDPR).

title: Development of a smart automated sorting system based on optimal route design using genetic algorithm
venue: Korean Journal of Information Processing Society
description: A smart automated sorting system that uses genetic algorithms to optimize routing for efficient logistics operations.
